title: Service disruption due to train fault on North East Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东北线列车故障导致的服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kerana kerosakan kereta api di Laluan Timur Laut
title_translations.ta: வடகிழக்கு பாதையில் ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [SBST]North-East Line update: Train service along NEL has resumed. Free buses between Woodleigh and Punggol stations has ceased.
[SBST]North-East Line update: Train service along NEL has resumed. Free buses between Woodleigh and Punggol stations still available.
[SBST]North-East Line update: No train svc btwn Woodleigh and Punggol. Shuttle bus & free boarding svc available btwn Woodleigh & Punggol.
[SBST] NEL: Estimate 30 minutes delay along North-East Line due to a train fault.
